sentences.en: Big business will never let petty nationalism get in the way of a good deal.
sentences.cn: 大企业永远不会让狭隘的民族主义妨碍它们做大好的买卖。

sentences.en: Chinese nationalism originates in reactions to imperialist invasions of China.
sentences.cn: 中国民族主义亦源于对帝国主义侵华之反动.

sentences.en: Cosmopolitanism became difficult to disentangle from its overtones of anti - nationalism.
sentences.cn: 世界主义很难摆脱 反 爱国主义的色彩.

sentences.en: His speech presented racist ideas under the guise of nationalism.
sentences.cn: 他的讲话以民族主义为幌子宣扬种族主义思想。

sentences.en: I think we'd better leave the subject of Nationalism.
sentences.cn: 我看我们最好还是搁下民族主义这个话题吧。

sentences.en: It represented a remarkable triumph of reason over selfish nationalism.
sentences.cn: 它表明理智对民族利己主义的显著胜利.

sentences.en: Nationalism was rapidly becoming a dangerous force.
sentences.cn: 民族主义迅速变为一股危险的势力.

sentences.en: Others say the returnees'driving force isn't exactly nationalism.
sentences.cn: 也有人说,海归的动力确切地说不是民族主义.

sentences.en: Proponents of economic nationalism had the president's ear.
sentences.cn: 总统对于经济民族主义的提议者则言听计从.

sentences.en: So how do we reinforce the modern concept of nationalism?
sentences.cn: 那么,如何才能确立现代爱国主义的价值观 呢 ?

sentences.en: The tide of nationalism is still running high in a number of republics.
sentences.cn: 民族主义浪潮在许多共和国势头正盛。

sentences.en: The word & quot ; nationalism & quot ; is used in at least two distinct senses.
sentences.cn: 单词“ nationalism ”在使用时至少有两个截然不同的含义.

sentences.en: The world is facing not peak oil, but a pinnacle of nationalism.
sentences.cn: 世界所面临的不是“峰值石油”, 而是民族主义的顶峰.

sentences.en: There is something about nationalism in this book, but I can't find the place.
sentences.cn: 这本书里谈到民族主义, 可是我找不到在哪里.

sentences.en: WHEN nationalism rears its head in China, the country's neighbours tremble.
sentences.cn: 当民族主义在中国抬头, 其邻国就开始颤抖.

words.tran_cn: 国家的；国民的；民族的；国立的
民族主义的（等于nationalistic）；国家主义的；民族独立主义的
本国的；土著的；天然的；与生俱来的；天赋的
全国性地；以国民立场地；举国一致地
民族主义者；国家主义者；民族独立主义者
先天论者；本土主义者；本土文化保护者
把…收归国有；使具有某国国籍；使成国家
使国有化；使民族化；使归化；使成国家
民族主义；国家主义；民族特性

phrases.tran_cn: 黑人民族主义；黑人国家主义
经济民族主义，经济国家主义

trans.tran_cn: 爱国主义，爱国心，民族主义，国家主义，民族特性
trans.tran_en: the desire by a group of people of the same race, origin, language etc to form an independent country
